miniGames.ships

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGames.ships.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends Object
    class ships represents a ship, stores the data of ship and provides methods to check state of ship after shoot
    Author:
    Wojciech Stok≈Çosa
    See Also:
    ShipsBoard, ShipsField

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean destroyed
      state of ship; true == ship is destroyed, false == ship is still functional
      private boolean[] destroyedParts
      boolean array stores datas about state of parts of this ship. true == destroyed part, flase == undamaged part
      private int hitCount
      number of hits
      private boolean plane 
      private int size
      size of ship, between 2 and 5 (include)
      private int x1
      coordinate of beginning of the ship on the x-axis
      private int x2
      coordinate of ending of the ship on the x-axis
      private int y1
      coordinate of beginning of the ship on the y-axis
      private int y2
      coordinate of beginning of the ship on the y-axis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(int size,
    int x1,
    int y1,
    int x2,
    int y2)
        constructor of the ship
        Parameters:
        size - size of ship, between 2 and 5 (include)
        x1 - coordinate of beginning of the ship on the x-axis
        y1 - coordinate of beginning of the ship on the y-axis
        x2 - coordinate of ending of the ship on the x-axis
        y2 - coordinate of ending of the ship on the y-axis

    • Method Detail

      • Destroy

        public boolean Destroy(int x,
              int y)
        method called after hit the ship
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of shoot on the x-axis
        y - coordinate of shoot on the y-axis
        Returns:
        true if ship is destroyed, false in other case

      • getDestroyedParts

        public boolean[] getDestroyedParts()
        get state of parts of ship
        Returns:
        boolean array of states of the part of ships. if state === true part of ship is destroyer, false in other case

        public boolean isPlane()
